title: Martin Scorsese's 11 Scariest Films
description:
In October 2009, iconic film director Martin Scorsese talked to The Daily Beast, an American news reporting and opinion site, about 11 films in which he dubbed his favorite horror movies. Now, in this one download, are all 11 of them.

1. The Haunting (1963)

2. Isle of the Dead (1945)

3. The Uninvited (1944)

4. The Entity (1981)

5. Dead of Night (1945)

6. The Changeling (1980)

7. The Shining (1980)

8. The Exorcist (1973)

9. Night of the Demon (1957)

10. The Innocents (1961)

11. Psycho (1960)
